product_name: Lole Twist Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Crafted for yoga comfort, the Lole Twist Tank Top for women goes with the flow thanks its soft, quick-drying fabric. 4-way stretch fabric moves with you, resists wrinkles and offers a UPF sun protection rating of 50+. Rear pocket stores your media player; reflective logo. Lole Twist Tank Top for women features a 26 in. length. Closeout.
short_description: Crafted for yoga comfort, the Lole Twist Tank Top for women goes with the flow thanks its soft, quick-drying fabric.
